description: Spaces by a dozen of the designers featured in the show house.
title: The Kips Bay Decorator Show House, Room by Room
title_page: The Kips Bay Decorator Show House, Room by Room - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 14,
At the Kips Bay Decorator Show House on East 63rd Street, an installation by Aakash Nihalani, a 24-year-old artist who makes playful street art from electrical tape, in a stairwell and hall decorated by Wayne Nathan.
